attributes.action: Prioritise Covid-19 vaccine in Tier 4 areas.
attributes.additional_details: Votes to give covid 19 vaccine to the parts of the UK with largest infection rates.
attributes.background: It makes common sense to concentrate the covid-19 vaccine in the highest rate of infection areas.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564437
